sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"编辑"之意。
means: compile ： 通常指根据搜集、整理的资料编辑词典或汇编文集。
edit ： 普通用词，含义广泛。指校订、编辑他人待出版的著作，也指对杂志、报刊的稿件进行编辑、编排加工。

sentence.Network_en: I used to edit the college paper in the old days.
sentence.Network_cn: 以前我曾经做过大学校报的主编。

sentence.Network_en: Three CBS cameramen were on site to shoot and edit taped reports.
sentence.Network_cn: 3名哥伦比亚广播公司的摄影记者在现场拍摄并编辑录像报道。

sentence.Network_en: When you edit the tape you can take out the giggles.
sentence.Network_cn: 你编辑录音时，可以把咯咯笑的部分删了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 编辑：如果是修改内容的话，点击菜单栏编辑（Edit）菜单中最下面一个选项，我的是英文版的，不知道怎么翻译，TouchUp Objiects …
编辑框(Edit)控件实际上是一个简易的文本编辑器，用户可以在编辑框中输入可添加或插入文本。还有复制、粘贴、剪切、删除等编辑 …
剪辑(editing)这个名称是电影逐渐成为一门独立艺术后形成的，与“剪接”相比，显然剪辑不仅包容了剪接这种技术因素，而且更强调了 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent. (as a verb): partly a back-formation from editor, reinforced by French éditer 'to edit' (from édition 'edition')

encyclopedia.content: edit 命令用途 edit是给用户针对汇编程序提供的一种简单的行编辑器。 语法 edit [ -r ] [ File ... ] 描述 edit命令启动一个行编辑器，该编辑器是为初级用户设计的，是 ex 编辑器的简化版。edit 编辑器属于一系列包含了ed 编辑器、ex 编辑器和vi 编辑器的编辑器族。了解edit 编辑器可以帮助您学习其他编辑器更高级的功能。要编辑文件的内容，请输入： edit命令使用 edit命令是一个负责编写程序的编辑软件，我们经常用它来编辑一些

entry.def: If you edit a text such as an article or a book, you correct and adapt it so that it is suitable for publishing.

example.ex: The majority of contracts give the publisher the right to edit a book after it's done.
example.tran: 大多数合同都赋予出版商在书稿完成后进行校订的权利。

entry.def: If you edit a book or a series of books, you collect several pieces of writing by different authors and prepare them for publishing.

example.ex: This collection of essays is edited by Ellen Knight...
example.tran: 这本文集是由埃伦·奈特编选的。

example.ex: She has edited the media studies quarterly, Screen.
example.tran: 她编选了这本媒体研究季刊——《银幕》。

entry.tran: 剪辑（电影、电视或广播节目）
entry.def: If you edit a film or a television or radio programme, you choose some of what has been filmed or recorded and arrange it in a particular order.

example.ex: He taught me to edit and splice film...
He is editing together excerpts of some of his films.
example.tran: 他正在将自己制作的一些电影的片断进行剪辑合成。

entry.def: Someone who edits a newspaper, magazine, or journal is in charge of it.

example.ex: I used to edit the college paper in the old days.
example.tran: 以前我曾经做过大学校报的主编。

entry.def: An edit is the process of examining and correcting a text so that it is suitable for publishing.

example.ex: The purpose of the edit is fairly simple—to chop out the boring bits from the original.
example.tran: 编辑的目的非常简单——删掉原稿中那些无用的部分。

means.word_mean: 1. prepare for publication or presentation by correcting, revising, or adapting;

sentences.sentence: "Edit a a book on lexical semantics"
"she edited the letters of the politician so as to omit the most personal passages"
"The same family has been editing the influential newspaper for almost 100 years"

means.word_mean: 3. cut and assemble the components of;

con共同+dit给予+ion表名词→共同给出的条件

editor[n.编辑, 编辑器, 编者]+ial……的→n.社论 adj.社论的;编辑上的
extradite[v.引渡回国,拿获归案]+ion动作或状态→n.引渡

stems_affixes.value_cn: 传统; 惯例; 传说
stems_affixes.word_buile: tra横+dit给予+ion表名词→横着给,代代相传→传统
tra交+it=dit给予+or人→把[国家]交出去的人→叛逆者, 叛国者

Sentence.sentence: Friends and other veterans of the process have warned Meg that the back and forth between editing parent and writing student can be traumatic (痛苦的).
That front-page package you've been working on is nearly complete; one last edit and it's finished.
He is interested in improving his editing skills.

sentences.en: He edited a book of poetry carefully.
sentences.cn: 他认真地编辑了一本诗集。

jushi.english: He edited a book of poetry carefully.
It took him about 20 hours to edit that film.
jushi.chinese: 他用了大约20小时剪辑那部影片。

jushi.english: The film was edited by a skilled technician.
jushi.chinese: 这部影片是由一位技术熟练的技术人员剪辑的。
